mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_BIRTH, U.USER_TEL, TSU.SIGNUP_DATE FROM STAFF S LEFT JOIN CHIEFSIGNUPOK COK ON S.STAFF_CODE = COK.STAFF_CODE LEFT JOIN CSIGNUPCHECK CCK ON COK.C_SIGNUP_CK_CODE = CCK.C_SIGNUP_CK_CODE LEFT JOIN CHIEFSIGNUP CSU ON CCK.C_SIGNUP_CODE = CCK.C_SIGNUP_CODE LEFT JOIN SCHOOL ON CSU.SCHOOL_CODE = SCHOOL.SCHOOL_CODE LEFT JOIN TEACHERSIGNUP TSU ON SCHOOL.SCHOOL_CODE = TSU.SCHOOL_CODE LEFT JOIN USERCODE UC ON TSU.USER_CODE = UC.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN USERINFO U ON UC.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE WHERE SCHOOL.SCHOOL_CODE = #{schoolCode}
